verses.verse: How have you <S%H5826>helped<s%> him that is without <S%H3581>power<s%>? how <S%H3467>save<s%> you the <S%H2220>arm<s%> that has <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%>?
How have you <S%H3289>counseled<s%> him that has <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>? and how have you <S%H7230>plentifully<s%> <S%H3045>declared<s%> the thing as it <S%H8454>is<s%>?
To whom have you <S%H5046>uttered<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%>? and whose <S%H5397>spirit<s%> came from <S%H3318>you<s%>?
<S%H7496>Dead<s%> things are <S%H2342>formed<s%> from under the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H7931>there<s%>.
<S%H7585>Hell<s%> is <S%H6174>naked<s%> before <S%H11>him<s%>, and destruction has no <S%H3682>covering<s%>.
He stretches <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> over the empty <S%H8414>place<s%>, and <S%H8518>hangs<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> upon <S%H1099>nothing<s%>.
He binds <S%H6887>up<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in his thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%>; and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> is not torn under <S%H1234>them<s%>.
He holds <S%H270>back<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of his <S%H3678>throne<s%>, and <S%H6576>spreads<s%> his cloud upon <S%H6051>it<s%>.
He has <S%H2328>surrounded<s%> the <S%H6440>waters<s%> with <S%H2706>bounds<s%>, until the <S%H216>day<s%> and <S%H2822>night<s%> come to an <S%H8503>end<s%>.
The <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H7322>tremble<s%> and are <S%H8539>astonished<s%> at his <S%H1606>reproof<s%>.
He <S%H7280>divides<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with his <S%H3581>power<s%>, and by his <S%H8394>understanding<s%> he <S%H4272>strikes<s%> through the <S%H7293>proud<s%>.
By his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> he has <S%H8235>garnished<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; his <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H2342>formed<s%> the <S%H1281>crooked<s%> <S%H5175>serpent<s%>.

<S%H7098>Behold<s%>, these are parts of his <S%H1870>ways<s%>: but how <S%H8102>little<s%> a <S%H1697>portion<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H7482>him<s%>? but the thunder of his <S%H1369>power<s%> who can <S%H995>understand<s%>?
